# Contributing

Thanks for your interest in contributing!

## How to Contribute
1. Fork the repo
2. Create a feature branch
3. Commit using clear messages
4. Open a Pull Request

## Coding Standards
- Use TypeScript
- Keep components clean and modular
- No inline JS (CSP rules)
- Use `/public/main.js` for client-side scripts

## Reporting Issues
Use the Bug Report template.
